name: Deviance (gameoeuvre)
description:
Deviance is a 3D first person platformer. When the player jumps, he creates vibrations that can alter the state of certain objects throughout the game. Journey through five levels of pure darkness and despair, but keep your wits about you.

The graphics were inspired by a strange passion for older operating systems as well as video games such as the following: Legend of Zelda series, Cave Story, and Doom. The sound is based on MIDI metal, dark ambience, and maniacal laughter.

If you get sick while playing, stop playing and seek medical treatment immediately.
